job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtjob descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are looking for a selfmotivated creative problemsolver responsible for developing programming debugging and supporting application software for automated laser optical component assembly and test equipment this position requires strong cc c python and java programming skills and experiences in equipment related development along with the knowledge in motion control machine vision application data acquisition and analysis and test instrument hardware control working experience in the laser application industry is a desired the candidate must be able to work with minimal supervision and utilize knowledge experience and judgment to accomplish goals within a fast paced environment years working experience related to automated system software development is a mustltbrgtltulgtltligt bsme bsee or bs computer engineering degree or higher is required ltligtltligt proficient in solving problems using a combination of theory and handson skills ltligtltligt ability to read and understand hardware specifications and schematics ltligtltligt strong team work and good communication skills with mechanical electrical and process engineers and technicians ltligtltligt solid knowledge and experience in pc based motion vision and data acquisition control platform ltligtltligt familiar with laser technologies applications and manufacturing processesltligtltulgt
